attributes.action: reverse the decision to increase apply road tax increases on older cars.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We want the new unfair road tax increases not to be applied to cars bought after 2001 but instead only apply to new cars. This tax is supposed to make people consider what cars to buy, but that decision has already been made making it unfair and purely a revenue making scheme, it will also make it harder if not impossible to sell on older high tax cars.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
